entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
